# scene

**Article**

The scene to which the action transitions.

## Overview

An asset should assign this relationship a scene prim, as defined through the [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/scenelibrary] `kind` metadata.

### Declaration

```other
rel scene
```

## Properties

- **info:id**: The action’s unique identifier.
title: scene
